00021 char *latlon_argv[2]={"proj=latlong",
00022                       "datum=WGS84"};
00023 char *mercator_argv[3]={"proj=merc",
00024                         "ellps=WGS84",
00025                         "lat_ts=0"};
00026 projPJ latlonProj, mercProj;
00027 
00028 void convertMercToLatLon(vector<double> &merc, double &lon, double &lat)
00029 {
00030   projUV data;
00031   double z;
00032   data.u = merc[0];
00033   data.v = merc[1];
00034   z=0;
00035   if (pj_transform(mercProj,latlonProj,1,0,&(data.u),&(data.v),&z) != 0)
00036   {
00037     cerr << "Converting " << merc[0] << ", " << merc[1] << 
00038       " to lat/lon failed" << endl;
00039     exit(1);
00040   }
00041   
00042   // Now output lat/lon of fix in degrees+decimal minutes
00043   lon=data.u*RAD_TO_DEG;
00044   lat=data.v*RAD_TO_DEG;
00045 }
00046 
00047 void convertLatLonToMerc(vector<double> &merc, double &lon, double &lat)
00048 {
00049   projUV data;
00050   double z;
00051   data.u = lon;
00052   data.v = lat;
00053   z=0;
00054   if (pj_transform(latlonProj,mercProj,1,0,&(data.u),&(data.v),&z) != 0)
00055   {
00056     cerr << "Converting " << merc[0] << ", " << merc[1] << 
00057       " to lat/lon failed" << endl;
00058     exit(1);
00059   }
00060   
00061   // Now output lat/lon of fix in degrees+decimal minutes
00062   merc[0]=data.u;
00063   merc[1]=data.v;
00064 }

00327 #if 0
00328   while (!done && j < 100)
00329   {
00330     double determJ;
00331     double deltax,deltay;
00332     bool sd_step = false;
00333 
00334     determJ=jac[0][0]*jac[1][1]-jac[0][1]*jac[1][0];
00335     normf = sqrt(gradf[0]*gradf[0]+gradf[1]*gradf[1]);
00336 
00337     cout << " Before step: f = " << f << endl;
00338 
00339     if (j!= 0) 
00340     {
00341       cout << "   normf = " << normf
00342            << "   lastnormf=" << lastnormf
00343            << "   difference = " << normf-lastnormf << endl;
00344       cout << "   Function value = " << f << endl;
00345       cout << "   Gradf=("<<gradf[0]<<","<<gradf[1]<<")"<<endl;
00346     }
00347     if (j!=0 && fabs(determJ) <1e-10)
00348     {
00349       cout << " Oops --- determinant getting small: " << determJ << endl;
00350     }
00351 
00352     // Newton direction
00353     // compute deltax, deltay from Jdelta=-f:
00354     // using analytic inverse of 2x2 matrix:
00355     deltax = (jac[1][1]*(-gradf[0])-jac[0][1]*(-gradf[1]))/determJ;
00356     deltay = (-jac[1][0]*(-gradf[0])+jac[0][0]*(-gradf[1]))/determJ;
00357 
00358     lastnormf=normf;
00359     lastf=f;
00360 
00361     NR_fix[0] += deltax;
00362     NR_fix[1] += deltay;
00363 
00364     rColl.computeCostFunctionAndHessian(NR_fix,f,gradf,jac);
00365 
00366       
00367     j++;
00368     cout << " N-R Iteration " << j << "X " << NR_fix[0] << " Y " 
00369          << NR_fix[1] 
00370          << " dx " << deltax << " dy " << deltay << endl;
00371     cout << "   f = " << f << endl;
00372 
00373     if ( deltax*deltax + deltay*deltay < 1e-4) // norm less than 1e-8
00374       done=true;
00375   }
00376 
00377   cout << "Final N-R result: X=" << NR_fix[0] << " Y=" << NR_fix[1] << endl;
00378   gnuplotFile << "replot " << NR_fix[0] << "," << NR_fix[1] << " with points title \"N-R ML Fix\"" << endl;
00379   convertMercToLatLon(NR_fix,lon,lat);
00380

00385   {
